title: Who are some of the best short story writers in English? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I can think of only one name and that is J.D Salinger. He has got the power to hold you till the end of the book with a language which makes you feel like you are actually listening to the character rather than reading a book. His “Nine stories” has a collection of short stories which could definitely be your lazy weekend’s treat! Also his book “the catcher in the rye” is a remarkable work of litretaure. the fluid style is definately going to keep you hooked to the pages!
Definitely, one of the good writers we have is Enid Blyton.
